B C D F G H I M N O P R S T V

B

begin() - Static method in class Game
This method begins the game.

C

Card - Class in <Unnamed>
This is the Card class which has many methods related to the Card object.
Card() - Constructor for class Card
this is a non-parameterised constructor that creates a null Card Object.
Card(int, int) - Constructor for class Card
this is a parameterised constructor that assigns the given value to the Card object
cards - Variable in class Deck
 
cardsNeeded - Variable in class Player
this is an array of 52 integers where based on the priority and the value of a Card(depending on how many places it is needed), the integer containing each value is given a number.
checkSequence(Deck) - Static method in class Deck
This method takes a Deck and checks whether it has a sequence in it(a set of cards where there are no gaps between the cards).
checkWin(Deck) - Static method in class Game
This is a security check method to ensure that a player is not bluffing.
checkWin() - Method in class Player
This method, invoked at the end of every Computer turn checks if the computer has won the game.
checkWinComps() - Static method in class Game
 
compareCard(Card, Card) - Static method in class Card
This method compares two Cards and returns an integer according to whichever one is greater
compHand - Variable in class Player
the Computer's hand
copyDeck(Deck) - Method in class Deck
This is a non-static method which copies the larger of the two Decks onto this Deck.
copyDeck(Deck, Deck) - Static method in class Deck
This is an overloaded version of copyDeck that is a semi modifier.

D

Deck - Class in <Unnamed>
This is the Deck class.
Deck(int) - Constructor for class Deck
This is a parameterised constructor which creates a Deck object whick is an array of cards of desired length.
Deck() - Constructor for class Deck
This is a non-parameterised constructor which creates a Deck object whick is an array of cards this array is fully populated and has 52 Card objects.
deckHist(Deck) - Static method in class Deck
This method takes a Deck and returns a histogram which contains the frequency of each Card in the Deck.
discard - Variable in class Game
A Deck object which contains the discard pile.
discard - Variable in class Player
the discard pile

F

fastPrint(String) - Static method in class Interface
This is a method that is used to make the output look more pleasing and is invoked frequently in the game.
findIndex(Deck, Card) - Static method in class Deck
This method returns the index of a card in a deck(the index number by which the identical element is refered.
findIndex(Card) - Static method in class Deck
This is an overLoaded version of findIndex that finds the index of a Card in a standard Deck.
findLowestCard(Deck, int, int) - Static method in class Deck
This method finds the smallest card in the given Deck.
findRangeLength(Deck) - Static method in class Deck
This method finds the range of a deck (the number of cards between the biggest card and the smallest card).
findRank(Deck) - Static method in class Deck
This method finds the rank of the cards which are part of a pair/triplet/fourOfAKind.
findSameRankSize(Deck) - Static method in class Deck
This method finds the length of the deck with tha same ranks which it gets as parameters.
fixFourOfAKind(Deck) - Static method in class Player
This method takes a Deck object(the Computer's hand) and extracts the pairs, triplets, fourOfAKinds which it puts into another Deck and returns.
fixSequence(Deck) - Static method in class Player
This method takes a Deck object(the Computer's hand) and extracts the sequences which it puts into another Deck and returns.

G

Game - Class in <Unnamed>
This is the Game class that is the central class.
Game() - Constructor for class Game
It is a non-parameterised constructor for the game object.

H

hand - Variable in class Player
the human Player's hand

I

insertionSort(Deck) - Static method in class Deck
This is a sorting method that works on the algorithm of insertionSort.
Interface - Class in <Unnamed>
The interface class is a class that has been designed to make communication between the Computer and the user easier and more pleasing.
Interface() - Constructor for class Interface
 
intro() - Static method in class Interface
This is one of the first methods to be invoked in a game and is invoked only in the beginning.
isPair(Deck) - Static method in class Deck
This method checks for a pair.
isSequence(Deck) - Static method in class Deck
This method checks if there is a sequence in the given Deck and returns a true if there is and a false if there is not.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class Interface
 
makeBigger(Deck) - Static method in class Deck
This method takes a Deck and returns a new Deck which is bigger by one Card(an extra Card object is added at the back of the Deck).
makeSmaller(Deck) - Static method in class Deck
This is a method that helps in avoiding NullPointerExceptions which occur very often when a loop traverses a deck and encounters a null object.
moveDown() - Method in class Deck
This is a static method where all the cards in this Deck are shifted one place forward(So the oneth card becomes the zeroeth card and so on).
moveUp() - Method in class Deck
This is a static method where all the cards in this Deck are shifted one place backwards(So the zeroeth card becomes the oneth card and so on).

N

nullExchange() - Method in class Deck
It is an instance method where this Deck which may contain null objects is modified and the null objects are 'pushed' to the back of the Deck.
nullHist(Deck) - Static method in class Deck
This method takes a Deck object and eturns a integer histogram the length of the Deck where each int (-1(if nul)or 0)represents the presence of nulls.

O

oppCard - Variable in class Player
the computer's prediction of the opponents card(it is barely used right now bu it shall be used in later versions).

P

pack - Variable in class Game
A Deck object which contains the pack (The pile where you draw your Cards from)
parseCard(String) - Static method in class Card
This method takes a string in form of "(rank) of (suit)".
parseString(Card) - Static method in class Card
This method is the exact opposite of parseCard.
pickCard(Game) - Static method in class Player
As the player decides intutively which Card to pick he/she will surely use some 'parameters'.
play() - Method in class Game
This method is invohed on this Game.
player - Variable in class Game
has the player attributes such as the 'hands', different set combinations etc.
Player - Class in <Unnamed>
This is the Player class whick has some of the essencial attributes of a Player such as his hand, the player's prediction of the oppponent's hand, memory of the discard pile, the different probabilities he/she might arrange them into, etc.
Player() - Constructor for class Player
This is a non parameterised constructor which returns a fully initialised Player object.
printCard(Card) - Static method in class Card
This method prints the card given to it in a user friendly format.
printDeck(Deck) - Static method in class Deck
This method takes a Deck object and prints its contents in a user friendly format.
printLine() - Static method in class Interface
This is a method which is invoked when a line needs to printed.
prob1 - Variable in class Player
It will contain the first probability (close to a set as the computer arranges it
prob2 - Variable in class Player
It will contain the second probability (close to a set as the computer arranges it
prob3 - Variable in class Player
It will contain the third probability (close to a set as the computer arranges it
prob4 - Variable in class Player
It will contain the fourth probability (close to a set as the computer arranges it
prob5 - Variable in class Player
It will contain the fifth probability (close to a set as the computer arranges it

R

randomInt(int, int) - Static method in class Deck
This is a recursive method that takes any two limits(one higher and one lower)and return a random integer that lie between the limits(including both of them).
rank - Variable in class Card
This integer represents the rank of a real life card.
rankHist(Deck) - Static method in class Deck
This method returns a histogram containing the number of Cards of each rank are there.
rankSort(Deck) - Static method in class Deck
This method is yet another srting algorithm This method has been written to cater to the needs of players who find it hard to visualise the Cards.
refreshCardsNeeded() - Method in class Player
This method is invoked on this Player.
refreshProbabilities() - Method in class Player
This is the central method in the Computer's 'brain'.
rules() - Static method in class Interface
This method prints the rules of Rummy in a user friendly format.

S

seqLength(Deck, int) - Static method in class Deck
This method is normally invoked with right after Deck.checkSequence.
shuffleDeck() - Method in class Deck
This method takes a Deck of Cards and then shuffles them up by swapping two cards at a time.
slowPrint(String) - Static method in class Interface
This is a method that is used to make the output look more pleasing and is invoked frequently in the game.
sortDeck(Deck) - Static method in class Deck
This is a sorting method which finds the lowest Card and switches it with the Card at the first place, then the second lowest Card is switched with the Card at the second place and so on.
start(Game) - Static method in class Player
This method is like the headquarters for the computer's part of the game.
status - Variable in class Game
It is a check condition to find out when a game is over
subDeck(Deck, int, int) - Static method in class Deck
This method takes a Deck and two indexes high and low to specify the range.
suit - Variable in class Card
This integer or char represents the suit of a real life card.
swapCard(Deck, int, int) - Static method in class Deck
This method takes a Deck of Cards and two ints.

T

toString() - Method in class Card
Returns a string representation of this Card.

V

veryFastPrint(String) - Static method in class Interface
This is a method that is used to make the output look more pleasing and is invoked frequently in the game.
